程序包 net.minecraft.client.resources

接口 IReloadableResourceManager

  • 所有超级接口:
    IResourceManager
    所有已知实现类:
    SimpleReloadableResourceManager
    public interface IReloadableResourceManager
extends IResourceManager

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      void registerReloadListener​(IResourceManagerReloadListener reloadListener)
      Registers a listener to be invoked every time the resource manager reloads.
      void reloadResources​(java.util.List<IResourcePack> resourcesPacksList)
      Releases all current resource packs, loads the given list, then triggers all listeners

      • 从接口继承的方法 net.minecraft.client.resources.IResourceManager

        getAllResources, getResource, getResourceDomains

    • 方法详细资料

      • reloadResources

        void reloadResources​(java.util.List<IResourcePack> resourcesPacksList)
        Releases all current resource packs, loads the given list, then triggers all listeners

      • registerReloadListener

        void registerReloadListener​(IResourceManagerReloadListener reloadListener)
        Registers a listener to be invoked every time the resource manager reloads. NOTE: The listener is immediately invoked once when it is registered.
